Interface to SAP Business Objects REST API
text: can install development version borestapi GitHub :

title: Interface to SAP Business Objects REST API
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(borestapi) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: borestapi: Interface to SAP Business Objects REST API — borestapi-package
title: borestapi: Interface to SAP Business Objects REST API — borestapi-package
text: R interface SAP Business Objects REST API. Use : Retrieve data Business Object document report tabs. Upload Excel spreadsheets Business Objects Retrieve data Busines Objects document data source Set document filters refresh document data.

title: Retrieve BO item proerties — get_bo_item
Retrieve BO item proerties — get_bo_item
text: opening connection open_bo_connection can retrieve properties items function. properties returned contain item id SI_ID column. matches ID properties page BO web GUI. id parent folder narrow search case duplicate item names. one item returned query tibble contain multiple rows

title: Retrieve BO item proerties — get_bo_item
code: # get the id of an item. Normally you would call open_bo_connection() conn= open_bo_connection(); get_bo_item(conn, name='test',parent_folder=3944223)$SI_ID #> Error: Could not resolve host: biprws #> Error in rlang::is_empty(conn): object 'conn' not found # get all the Excel documents in a folder get_bo_item(open_bo_connection(),parent_folder = 3944223, kind = 'Excel') #> Error: Could not resolve host: biprws

what: Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables — open_bo_connection
title: Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables — open_bo_connection
text: Open connection BO server. can keep parameters environment variables

title: Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables — open_bo_connection
code: open_bo_connection(   server = Sys.getenv("BO_SERVER"),   username = Sys.getenv("BO_USERNAME"),   password = get_user_password(username, server),   save_password = TRUE )

title: Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables — open_bo_connection
text: server Server connect "server:port" (optional) Defaults BO_SERVER environment variable username (optional) Defaults "BO_USERNAME environment variable password (optional) save_password Save password encrypted database. Saving password required automatic reconnection token expiration conn Connection reference reuse (optional)

title: Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables — open_bo_connection
Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables — open_bo_connection
code: # open a connection to the server in environment variable "BO_SERVER" using user in "BO_USERNAME". # and password in the database open_bo_connection() #> Error: Could not resolve host: biprws # open a connection to a server using username and password open_bo_connection(Sys.getenv("BO_SERVER"), username = 'john.capehart', password=getPass()) #> Error in getPass(): could not find function "getPass"
